org.openntf.xworlds.core
Class Command

java.lang.Object
  org.openntf.xworlds.core.Command

public class Command
extends java.lang.Object

Since:
1.0.0 Defines the OSGi commands made available for XWorlds from OSGi console. Commands available are:
  • xworlds report
  • xworlds counters
  • xworlds install
Author:
Daniele Vistalli

Method Detail

report

public void report()
Dumps out the XWorlds Manager report to the console

counters

public void counters(boolean enable,
                     boolean perThread)
Enables or disables the ODA counters per thread. Default ODA counters as of 2.5.0 are:
  • Lotus objects accessed
  • recycle errors
  • automatic recycles processed
  • manual recycles processed
Current counters can be dumped out by calling Factory.dumpCounters(boolean)

Parameters:
enable - boolean whether or not to enable the counters
perThread - boolean whether or not counters are enabled globally or on a thread-by-thread basis

install

public void install(java.lang.String packageToInstall)
Allows a bundle to be manually installed. This does not appear to be used currently

Parameters:
packageToInstall - String name of bundle to install

setContext

public void setContext(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context)
Sets the bundle context, required for installing packages

Parameters:
context - BundleContext in which the commands
